properties.name: Allenholm Farm
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown150 South Street, South Hero, VTOne guest suite with private deck available on 100 acre working farm/apple orchard. Petting paddock includes donkeys, sheep, horses, rabbits and goats. Country breakfast included. On-site farm store sells homemade applesauce, apple butter, jams, jellies, and pies made with fruit from the farm. Store also features an observation beehive. Guests may pick their own apples in the fall, press cider, and make hand-cranked ice cream. Moonlit wagon rides and school tours available. Justice of the Peace on-site. Open year-round.

properties.name: Bona Vista Farm
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown10 Cummings Road, Winchendon, MA2 guest rooms on 80 acre, colonial-era organic farm. Animals include pigs, turkeys, a cow, and laying hens. Guests may help with farm chores. Breakfast includes organically-raised sausage, bacon, ham and eggs, as well as homemade granola. Hot tub and spring-fed pond on-site. Reiki sessions available by appointment. Open weekends year-round. Open daily during school vacations & summer.

properties.name: Coutures Maple Shop and Bed and Breakfast
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown 560 Route 100, Westfield, VT3 guest rooms & 1 family suite (for 4-6 guests) in 1890s farmhouse on 325-acre dairy farm. Sugarhouse on-site. Breakfast features maple syrup made on the farm. Guests may observe maple-sugaring process (Spring). Maple Shop carries Vermont maple syrup and maple products.

properties.name: Crescent Bay Farm Bed and Breakfast
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown153 West Shore Road, South Hero, VT3 guest rooms in renovated 1820s house on 121-acre working cattle farm. Country-style breakfast included. Farm features approximately 20 llamas. Homespun yarn harvested from llama wool available for purchase. Maple sugaring takes place in Spring. Open May-August.

properties.name: Cumworth Farm
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown472 West Cummington Road, Cummington, MA6 guest rooms in 200-year-old Dutch Colonial farmhouse on 200-acre sheep and berry farm. Maple sugaring operation on-site with 4,000 taps. Guests may help feed the sheep and pick their own berries. Breakfast features maple syrup made on the farm. Hot tub with enclosed gazebo available. Open May 1  October 30.

properties.name: D Acres of New Hampshire
properties.description: Posted by NewenglandgrownStreeter Woods Road, Rumney, NHAn educational center that researches, applies and teaches skills of sustainable living and small-scale organic farming on 180-acre farm. Overnight options include: 1 private room w/ shared bath; dorm room w/ 3 single beds; yoga room w/ space for 12 sleeping bags; outdoor camping and car camping; shared tree houses. Guests can learn about alternative building and renewable energy projects, and visit the farm animals. Extra charge for meals ( and up). All meals are vegetarian and 90% of all food served is organic. Many educational workshops & events available.

properties.name: Delta Organic Farm Bed and Breakfast
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown352 East Hadley Road, Amherst, MA1 guest suite w/ queen bed and sofa bed available on 40-acre, certified organic produce farm. Organic breakfast available upon request (0/guest). Guest suite is safe for the environmentally sensitive. Wireless web access. Conference room available (capacity: 40).

properties.name: Emergo Farm Bed and Breakfast
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown261 Webster Hill, Danville, VTDouble occupancy rooms and family suites available on 200-acre dairy farm. Breakfast provided. Guests may participate in farm chores. Heritage tour and dairy tour available.

properties.name: Fitch Claremont House
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown83 Fitchville Road, Bozrah, CT4 guest rooms available in 1790s house on vineyard with on-site winery. Seasonal breakfast features home-grown produce. Winery tour available. Each room features a fireplace, private bath, and complementary bottle of homemade wine.

properties.name: Four Springs Farm
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown776 Gee Hill Road, Royalton, VT4-bunk rustic cabin and secluded tent sites available on 70-acre organic vegetable and poultry farm. No meals provided with stay, but guests may pick their own vegetables for purchase. Picnic pavilion available for rental. Small bakery on site.

properties.name: Hawkmeadow Farm Bed and breakfast
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown322 Lander Road, Lee, MA3-room suite w/ 3 beds (2 twins/1 queen) available on produce & llama farm. Breakfast provided. Llamas available for Berkshire Mountain hikes. Guided sunset hikes available by appointment. Open year-round.

properties.name: Howden Farm
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown303 Rannapo Rd, Sheffield, MA4 rooms available in 1830s Greek Revival farmhouse on 250-acre working farm. Family heirloom pumpkins and other produce grown. Breakfast provided. Guests are welcome to explore the farm. Open year-round.

properties.name: Ingalls Crossing
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown175 Blair Road, Williamstown, MA2 rooms available on working dairy farm. Breakfast included. Children are welcome to feed and pet the llamas, ducks and rabbit. Evening babysitting available for a modest charge. Open year-round.

properties.name: Inn at Valley Farms
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown 633 Wentworth Road, Walpole, MA3 rooms in 1774 Colonial home B&B. 2 cottages also available on 105 acres of farmland. Organic flower and vegetable gardens. Guests are welcome to visit the farm animals, and to pick eggs from the henhouse and produce from the garden. From the website: There are several diverse habitats on the farm attracting numerous wild bird, plant and animal species including, wild turkeys, pheasant, Dutchman\'s Breeches, Jack-in-the-Pulpit, fox, deer, raccoon, Trout Lilies, Trilliums, nesting kestrels and killdeer, red tail hawks and more. Guests may also visit the farm next door to observe milking.

properties.name: Maple House Bed and Breakfast
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown51 Middletown Hill Road, Rowe, MA4 rooms available in 200-year-old inn on homestead farm. Breakfast included. Guests may help feed the goats, sheep, chickens and turkeys. Retreat/reunion full-house rental available for up to 10 people. Open year-round.

properties.name: Shearer Hill Farm Bed and Breakfast
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown297 Shearer Hill Road, Wilmington, VT6 rooms available on small working farm. Guests may participate in maple sugaring in private sugarhouse (March, early April). Breakfast included, features Vermont apples and maple syrup made on the farm. Apple-baker bowls and syrup available for purchase. Open year-round.

properties.name: Shelburne Farms
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown1611 Harbor Road, Shelburne, VT24 bedrooms and 2 cottages available on 1400-acre working farm, national historic landmark & nonprofit environmental education center. From the website: Our nearly 400 acres of sustainably managed woodlands received Green Certification from the Forest Stewardship Council in 1998. Our grass-based dairy supports a herd of 125 purebred, registered Brown Swiss cows. Childrens farmyard on-site. Cheesemaking on-site. Many educational programs available

properties.name: Shepherd's Hill Farm
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown25 Hartwood Way, Taftsville, VT2 rooms available in modern farmhouse on sheep farm. Breakfast included. From the website: Guests may participate in farm chores, if desired, consisting of feeding the sheep, moving fences to assure proper grazing rotation, cleaning the barn, or weeding the garden. Guests may also help with honey harvesting and egg collection. Farm store sells lamb meat, honey, eggs, wool, blankets, produce, herbal products, and hand-woven rugs. Swimming pond on-site. Wedding/event rental available. Open year-round.

properties.name: Stevens Farm Bed and Breakfast
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown749 Old Coldbrook Road, Barre, MA6 rooms available on working farm. Breakfast and afternoon tea included. Guests may help with haying (Summer) and make apple cider (Fall). Pond for fishing/ice skating and 20 x 40 swimming pool on-site. Hay rides available. Conference room available. Open year-round.

properties.name: Sunset Farm Bed and Breakfast
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown74 Main Road, Tyringham, MA5 rooms available on 300-year-old farm. Breakfast includes eggs and maple syrup from the farm. Former dairy barn (built in 1891) available for weddings & other events. Event capacity: 100 inside barn, 400 for outdoor event with tents.

properties.name: Upland Meadows Farm
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown338 West Cummington Road, Cummington, MA3 rooms available on 200-acre working farm. Breakfast included. Farm includes a peach orchard, horses, goats, sheep, and a llama. Field rental available for weddings/events. Pets welcome. Horse boarding available for 0 per day.

properties.name: Warfield House Inn
properties.description: Posted by Newenglandgrown 200 Warfield Road, Charlemont, MA8 rooms available in 2 houses on 530-acre working farm. Breakfast included. 2 restaurants on-site (restaurants closed Mondays). Farm raises emus, Hereford beef cattle, Haflinger horses, chickens and llamas. Event/wedding/conference facility available. Event capacity: 160 - inside, 200 - outdoor pavilion. Llamas available for hikes. 2 hot tubs on-site.
